titles.title: Publicly Traded Partnership Equity Act of 2001
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to treat distributions from publicly traded partnerships as qualifying income of regulated investment companies, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 4/4/2001--Introduced. Publicly Traded Partnership Equity Act of 2001 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to include distributions from publicly traded partnerships as qualifying income of regulated investment companies. Excludes such distributions from the source-based inclusion limitation applicable to other partnerships.Applies specified passive activity provisions for publicly traded partnerships to regulated investment companies.
